sait.frms.problemdomain

Class RandomAccessObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.RandomAccessFile
      • sait.frms.problemdomain.RandomAccessObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RandomAccessObject
extends java.io.RandomAccessFile
    Class description: This class is used to read and write information from random access file of the reservation.
